byline.contributor: Rick Rojas contributed reporting from Prescott, Ariz.
byline.original: By RUKMINI CALLIMACHI and ERIC SCHMITT

abstract: Islamic State reportedly sends family of American hostage Kayla Mueller photographs of her corpse as proof that she is dead; ISIS claims that Mueller died in building demolished by Jordanian airstrikes.
lead_paragraph: The Islamic State, which had held Kayla Mueller captive since August 2013, sent her parents at least three photographs of her corpse as proof of death.

headline.main: With Proof From ISIS of Her Death, Family Honors Kayla Mueller
headline.print_headline: Proof of Death in Hand, Family Honors Hostage

snippet: The Islamic State, which had held Kayla Mueller captive since August 2013, sent her parents at least three photographs of her corpse as proof of death.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
